channel.title: maven on wangqingzh

item.title: Maven
item.description: 是什么 Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project’s build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information. https://maven.apache.org/ 使用 下载 https://maven.apache.org/download.cgi 安装 (windows) 前提 jdk 添加环境变量 MAVEN_HOME=**\apache-maven-3.6.1\ PATH=;%MAVEN_HOME%\bin 修改配置文件 **\apache-maven-3.6.1\conf\settings.xml 1 2 3 4 5
